name: On A Roll (itch) (Silver Bunny Games)
description:
On A Roll is a game about rollin'!

As dice

A platformer about completing challenges as a non-circular, rollin' object

CONTROLS:

A / Left Arrow: left

D / Right Arrow: right

W / Up Arrow / Spacebar: jump

Made for the GMTK 2022 Jam, with theme "Roll of the dice"
